languages.text: "Как старший функционирующий член Братства Марса, я, Магос Эксплоратор Паскаль Ханейманн, объявляю сей храм {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Бога-Машины{/g} скомпрометированным и запрещаю служение в нем. Я низлагаю с трона Фабрикатор-Цензора, невежественного еретика, предавшего Омниссию, и предаю анафеме внедренные им Установленные процедуры. Да будет прерван цикл запущенных им богохульных операций".

"As the senior functioning member of the Priesthood of Mars, I, Magos Explorator Pasqal Haneumann, declare this temple to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Machine God{/g} compromised and forthwith forbid all service within it. I dethrone the Fabricator-Censor, the ignorant heretic who has betrayed the Omnissiah, and condemn as anathema any and all standard procedures implemented by him. Let the cycle of the blasphemous operations he has put in motion be discontinued."
languages.original_text: "Как старший функционирующий член Братства Марса, я, Магос Эксплоратор Паскаль Ханейманн, объявляю сей храм {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Бога-Машины{/g} скомпрометированным и запрещаю служение в нем. Я низлагаю с трона Фабрикатор-Цензора, невежественного еретика, предавшего Омниссию, и предаю анафеме внедренные им Установленные процедуры. Да будет прерван цикл запущенных им богохульных операций".

traits.locale_text: "As the senior functioning member of the Brotherhood of Mars, I, Magos Explorator Pasqal Haneumann, declare this temple to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Machine God{/g} compromised and forbid all service within it. I dethrone the Fabricator, the ignorant heretic who has betrayed the Omnissiah, and anathematise any and all Standard Procedures implemented by him. Let the cycle of the blasphemous operations he has put into motion be broken."

languages.text: “身为火星祭司的高阶成员，我，开拓贤者帕斯卡·哈努曼，正式宣布这座{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万机之神{/g}的神殿遭到了毁损。我宣布，这所神殿中的所有服务都将立刻停止。我在此废除铸造审查师的称号，这个无知的异端分子背叛了欧姆尼塞亚。同时，我谴责这个叛徒实施的一切标准程序，并将这些程序视为邪恶之物。是时候让他实施的亵渎行为停下来了。”
languages.original_text: "As the senior functioning member of the Priesthood of Mars, I, Magos Explorator Pasqal Haneumann, declare this temple to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Machine God{/g} compromised and forthwith forbid all service within it. I dethrone the Fabricator-Censor, the ignorant heretic who has betrayed the Omnissiah, and condemn as anathema any and all standard procedures implemented by him. Let the cycle of the blasphemous operations he has put in motion be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: “身为火星兄弟会的高阶成员，我，开拓贤者帕斯卡·哈努曼，正式宣布这座{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万机之神{/g}的神殿遭到了毁损。我宣布，这所神殿中的所有服务都将立刻停止。我在此废除铸造审查师的称号，这个无知的异端分子背叛了欧姆尼塞亚。同时，我谴责这个叛徒实施的一切标准程序，并将这些程序视为邪恶之物。是时候让他实施的亵渎行为停下来了。”

languages.text: «Como miembro operativo de mayor rango del Sacerdocio de Marte, yo, el Magos explorador Pasqal Haneumann, declaro que este templo al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Dios Máquina{/g} ha sido comprometido y por lo tanto prohíbo que continúen los servicios en el interior. Destituyo al fabricator-censor, el hereje ignorante que ha traicionado al Omnissiah, y condeno como anatema cualquier procedimiento estándar instaurado por él. Que se interrumpa el ciclo de operaciones blasfemas que ha instaurado».
languages.original_text: "As the senior functioning member of the Priesthood of Mars, I, Magos Explorator Pasqal Haneumann, declare this temple to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Machine God{/g} compromised and forthwith forbid all service within it. I dethrone the Fabricator-Censor, the ignorant heretic who has betrayed the Omnissiah, and condemn as anathema any and all standard procedures implemented by him. Let the cycle of the blasphemous operations he has put in motion be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: «Como miembro operativo de mayor rango de la Hermandad de Marte, yo, el magos explorador Pasqal Haneumann, declaro que este templo al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Dios Máquina{/g} ha sido comprometido y por lo tanto prohíbo que continúen los servicios en el interior. Destituyo al fabricator-censor, el hereje ignorante que ha traicionado al Omnissiah, y condeno como anatema cualquier procedimiento estándar instaurado por él. Que se interrumpa el ciclo de operaciones blasfemas que ha instaurado».

languages.text: 「火星の神官団の上級メンバーとして、自分、マゴス探検家パスカル・ヘニュマンは、この神殿が侵害された{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}機械神{/g}の神殿であることを宣言し、直ちに神殿内のあらゆる奉仕を禁ずる。万機神を裏切った無知な異端者であるファブリケーター・センサーを退位させ、これが実施したあらゆる標準的手順を忌まわしいものとして非難する。奴が始めた冒涜的な作戦のサイクルを断ち切るのだ」
languages.original_text: "As the senior functioning member of the Priesthood of Mars, I, Magos Explorator Pasqal Haneumann, declare this temple to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Machine God{/g} compromised and forthwith forbid all service within it. I dethrone the Fabricator-Censor, the ignorant heretic who has betrayed the Omnissiah, and condemn as anathema any and all standard procedures implemented by him. Let the cycle of the blasphemous operations he has put in motion be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: 「火星の神官団の上級メンバーとして、自分、マゴス探検家パスカル・ヘニュマンは、この神殿が侵害された{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}機械神{/g}の神殿であることを宣言し、直ちに神殿内のあらゆる奉仕を禁ずる。万機神を裏切った無知な異端者であるファブリケーター・センサーを退位させ、これが実施したあらゆる標準的手順を忌まわしいものとして非難する。奴が始めた冒涜的な作戦のサイクルを断ち切るのだ」

languages.text: "Als leitendes funktionierendes Mitglied der Priesterschaft des Mars erkläre ich, Magos Explorator Pasqal Haneumann, diesen Tempel des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Maschinengotts{/g} für befleckt und untersage ab sofort sämtliches Wirken darin. Der Fabricator-Zensor, ein ignoranter Ketzer, der den Omnissiah verraten hat, ist hiermit abgesetzt, und alle von ihm eingesetzten Standardprozesse unterliegen dem Kirchenbann. Der Zyklus blasphemischer Handlungen, den er in Gang gesetzt hat, sei hiermit beendet."
languages.original_text: "As the senior functioning member of the Priesthood of Mars, I, Magos Explorator Pasqal Haneumann, declare this temple to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Machine God{/g} compromised and forthwith forbid all service within it. I dethrone the Fabricator-Censor, the ignorant heretic who has betrayed the Omnissiah, and condemn as anathema any and all standard procedures implemented by him. Let the cycle of the blasphemous operations he has put in motion be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: "Als leitendes funktionierendes Mitglied der Bruderschaft des Mars erkläre ich, Magos Explorator Pasqal Haneumann, diesen Tempel des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Maschinengotts{/g} für befleckt und untersage ab sofort sämtliches Wirken darin. Der Fabricator-Zensor, ein ignoranter Ketzer, der den Omnissiah verraten hat, ist hiermit abgesetzt, und alle von ihm eingesetzten Standardprozesse unterliegen dem Kirchenbann. Der Zyklus blasphemischer Handlungen, den er in Gang gesetzt hat, sei hiermit beendet."

languages.text: « En tant que membre de haut rang du clergé de Mars et porteur du titre de magos explorator, moi, Pasqal Haneumann, déclare que ce temple dédié au {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Dieu-Machine{/g} a été compromis et interdit toute cérémonie en son enceinte. Je détrône le fabricator-censeur, pour son ignorance, son hérésie et sa trahison de l'Omnimessie, et je déclare anathèmes toutes les procédures standard décrétées par lui. J'ordonne que cesse incontinent son cycle d'opérations blasphématoires. »
languages.original_text: "As the senior functioning member of the Priesthood of Mars, I, Magos Explorator Pasqal Haneumann, declare this temple to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Machine God{/g} compromised and forthwith forbid all service within it. I dethrone the Fabricator-Censor, the ignorant heretic who has betrayed the Omnissiah, and condemn as anathema any and all standard procedures implemented by him. Let the cycle of the blasphemous operations he has put in motion be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: « En tant que membre de haut rang de la Confrérie de Mars et porteur du titre de magos explorator, moi, Pasqal Haneumann, déclare que ce temple dédié au {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Dieu-Machine{/g} a été compromis et interdit toute cérémonie en son enceinte. Je détrône le fabricator-censeur, pour son ignorance, son hérésie et sa trahison de l'Omnimessie, et je déclare anathèmes toutes les Procédures Standard décrétées par lui. J'ordonne que cesse incontinent son cycle d'opérations blasphématoires. »

languages.text: "Ben Magos Keşiftör Pasqal Haneumann, Mars Rahipliği'nin kıdemli mensubu olarak {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Makine Tanrı{/g} adına yapılmış bu tapınağın kutsallığının ihlal edildiğini bildiriyor ve içinde gerçekleşen tüm hizmetleri yasaklıyorum. Hermesih'e ihanet eden cahil kâfir Denetçi Fabrikatörlük makamından alıyor ve uyguladığı tüm standart prosedürleri lanet olarak kınıyorum. Harekete geçirdiği küfürlü faaliyetlerin döngüsü durdurulsun."
languages.original_text: "As the senior functioning member of the Priesthood of Mars, I, Magos Explorator Pasqal Haneumann, declare this temple to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Machine God{/g} compromised and forthwith forbid all service within it. I dethrone the Fabricator-Censor, the ignorant heretic who has betrayed the Omnissiah, and condemn as anathema any and all standard procedures implemented by him. Let the cycle of the blasphemous operations he has put in motion be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: "Ben, Magos Keşiftör Pasqal Haneumann, Mars Rahipliği'nin kıdemli üyesi olarak {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Makine Tanrı{/g} adına yapılmış bu tapınağın ihlal edildiğini ilan ediyor ve içindeki gerçekleşen tüm hizmetleri yasaklıyorum. Hermesih'e ihanet eden cahil kâfir Denetçi Fabrikatör'ü mevkisinden alıyor ve uyguladığı tüm standart prosedürleri lanet olarak kınıyorum. Harekete geçirdiği küfürlü faaliyetlerin döngüsü durdurulsun."
